workouts.name: Barbell Bench Press
workouts.explanation: Lie on a flat bench with a barbell gripped slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up to the starting position.

workouts.name: Deadlift
workouts.explanation: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at the hips and knees to grip the barbell. Keep your back straight as you lift the bar by extending your hips and knees.

workouts.name: Squat
workouts.explanation: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your chest up. Return to standing by driving through your heels.

workouts.name: Pull-Up
workouts.explanation: Hang from a pull-up bar with hands shoulder-width apart. Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, then lower back down with control.

workouts.name: Overhead Press
workouts.explanation: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell at shoulder height. Press the bar overhead until your arms are fully extended, then lower it back down.

workouts.name: Bent Over Row
workouts.explanation: Bend at the hips with a slight knee bend, hold a barbell with hands shoulder-width apart. Pull the bar towards your waist, then lower it back down.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Fly
workouts.explanation: Lie on a flat bench with dumbbells in each hand. With a slight bend in your elbows, lower the weights out to the sides, then bring them back up in an arc motion.

workouts.name: Leg Press
workouts.explanation: Sit in the leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Push the platform away by extending your knees, then return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldown
workouts.explanation: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grip the bar wider than shoulder-width. Pull the bar down to your chest, then slowly return it to the starting position.

workouts.name: Romanian Deadlift
workouts.explanation: Hold a barbell with hands shoulder-width apart, keep your back straight as you hinge at the hips to lower the bar. Return to standing by driving your hips forward.

workouts.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
workouts.explanation: Lie on an incline bench with dumbbells in each hand. Press the weights up until your arms are extended, then lower them back down to chest level.

workouts.name: Cable Crossover
workouts.explanation: Stand between two cable machines with handles at shoulder height. Bring your hands together in front of your chest in a hugging motion, then return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
workouts.explanation: Stand a few feet in front of a bench, place one foot behind you on the bench. Lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, then push back up.

workouts.name: Face Pull
workouts.explanation: Attach a rope to a cable machine at face height. Pull the rope towards your face while spreading your hands apart, then slowly return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Hanging Leg Raise
workouts.explanation: Hang from a pull-up bar, keep your legs straight as you lift them up to hip height. Lower them back down with control.

workouts.name: Barbell Curl
workouts.explanation: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell with an underhand grip. Curl the bar up towards your shoulders, then lower it back down.

workouts.name: Skull Crusher
workouts.explanation: Lie on a flat bench with an EZ bar or dumbbells. Lower the weight towards your forehead by bending your elbows, then extend your arms to return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Seated Calf Raise
workouts.explanation: Sit on a calf raise machine with your knees under the pads. Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them below the platform for a stretch.

workouts.name: Front Squat
workouts.explanation: Hold a barbell in the front rack position (resting on your shoulders). Squat down by bending your knees and hips, then drive back up through your heels.

workouts.name: T-Bar Row
workouts.explanation: Stand over a T-bar row machine, bend at the hips with a slight knee bend. Pull the handle towards your torso, then lower it back down with control.

workouts.name: Dips
workouts.explanation: Grip parallel bars, lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows. Push back up to the starting position.

workouts.name: Hammer Curl
workouts.explanation: Hold dumbbells with a neutral grip (palms facing each other). Curl the weights up while keeping your palms inward, then lower them back down.

workouts.name: Lateral Raise
workouts.explanation: Hold dumbbells at your sides with a slight bend in your elbows. Raise the weights out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower them back down.

workouts.name: Reverse Fly
workouts.explanation: Bend at the hips with dumbbells in hand, keep a slight bend in your elbows. Raise the weights out to the sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

workouts.name: Hack Squat
workouts.explanation: Stand in a hack squat machine with your shoulders under the pads. Lower your body by bending your knees, then push back up through your heels.

workouts.name: Preacher Curl
workouts.explanation: Sit at a preacher curl bench, rest your arms on the pad. Curl the barbell or dumbbells up, then lower them back down with control.

workouts.name: Seated Row
workouts.explanation: Sit at a seated row machine, grip the handle and keep your back straight. Pull the handle towards your torso, then slowly extend your arms to return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Standing Calf Raise
workouts.explanation: Stand on a calf raise machine with your shoulders under the pads. Raise your heels as high as possible, then lower them below the platform for a stretch.

workouts.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
workouts.explanation: Lie on a flat bench with hands closer than shoulder-width on the barbell. Lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up, focusing on triceps engagement.

workouts.name: Incline Cable Fly
workouts.explanation: Set an incline bench between two cable machines. With handles at the bottom, bring your hands together in an arc motion, squeezing your chest at the top.

workouts.name: Good Morning
workouts.explanation: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, place a barbell on your shoulders. Hinge at the hips to lower your torso until it's nearly parallel to the floor, then return to standing.

workouts.name: Arnold Press
workouts.explanation: Sit on a bench with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you. As you press the weights overhead, rotate your palms to face forward. Reverse the motion on the way down.

workouts.name: Zottman Curl
workouts.explanation: Hold dumbbells with palms facing up during the curl. At the top, rotate your palms to face down as you lower the weights.

workouts.name: Pec Deck Fly
workouts.explanation: Sit at a pec deck machine with your arms against the pads. Bring your hands together in front of your chest by squeezing your pecs, then return to the starting position.

workouts.name: Step-Up
workouts.explanation: Stand facing a bench or platform, step one foot onto it. Push through your heel to lift your body up, then step back down with control.

workouts.name: Chin-Up
workouts.explanation: Hang from a pull-up bar with an underhand grip (palms facing you). Pull your body up until your chin is above the bar, then lower back down.

workouts.name: Landmine Press
workouts.explanation: Place one end of a barbell in a landmine or corner. Press the weighted end overhead from shoulder height, keeping your core engaged.

workouts.name: Farmer's Walk
workouts.explanation: Hold heavy dumbbells or farmer's walk handles at your sides. Walk maintaining an upright posture for a set distance or time.
